previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Vancouver Whitecaps FC | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution host their west coast rivals, the Vancouver Whitecaps for their season home opener.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs. Vancouver Whitecaps

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Conor Frederick
timelineItems.text: #NERevs home opener. #BeThere322

timelineItems.name: revfan6
timelineItems.text: Match day baby! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: Kickoff of #NERevs home opener vs. Vancouver. http://t.co/plfhNJj9js

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: Kickoff of #NERevs home opener vs. Vancouver. http://t.co/plfhNJj9js

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Tierney, Rowe and Sene have taken free kicks so far. #NERevs clearly looking for a specialist

timelineItems.name: VanCityVilla
timelineItems.text: Route One #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Russell Teibert.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Three early corners for #NERevs. Will their first goal of 2014 come off a set piece? #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Allan Grochowski
timelineItems.text: I'll be surprised if Ousted's early save isn't up for #MLSSoccer Save of the Week. #Wow #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match David Ousted (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: Did the @WhitecapsFC not learn from previous week? Enough with the long balls. Play for possession. #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 13' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Bunbury almost latches onto a bouncing ball in behind the Vancouver backline, but Ousted charges to collect.

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Good effort on Bunbury's part #NERevs

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: Loud and proud! #NERevs http://t.co/VNKkmcCSZ0

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: Loud and proud! #NERevs http://t.co/VNKkmcCSZ0

timelineItems.name: RevGunner
timelineItems.text: The Fort is in great voice today. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: Started out much more aggressive today. Hopefully we can maintain that high pressure. Vancouver sitting deep giving us space helps. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Kate Z
timelineItems.text: Thank you for clearing that sene!!! #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Saer Sene (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: A vigilant David Ousted blocks Saer Sene's long range effort

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Stychyshyn
timelineItems.text: Thank your local deity that Ousted brought his "A" game today. #VWFC #VANvNE #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Lizz Summers
timelineItems.text: Our new kits look sick in action #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Saer Sene (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrew Farrell.

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Rowe pulling the strings in the midfield so far. Nigel Reo-Coker not able to get close to him #nerevs #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andy Dorman (New England Revolution).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Vancouver is giving the #NERevs too much space in the midfield. They will be punished if this continues

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: #NERevs home opener ends in scoreless draw vs. Vancouver. Revs remain goal-less on the season through 270 minutes.

timelineItems.name: RevGunner
timelineItems.text: So Kobayashi won't shoot the ball. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: Bad draw. Should of had all 3 points. ZERO goals in 3 games. Rowe leaves with hamstring injury and didn't look good #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Chris Withers
timelineItems.text: I'll take it, but that starting XI needs some tweaking. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: We're now 270 minutes into the season & #NERevs haven't scored yet. Starting to become a storyline, but still ways off from franchise record

timelineItems.name: Ben Saufley
timelineItems.text: Hey it’s good to see the defense finally showed up at least?? SO MANY wasted opportunities. Feels like middle of last season. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: I'll take the point! Can't wait to see the caps back at BC place. Seem to be a different team (better) when playing at home. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: madisonroad
timelineItems.text: Scoreless result in Foxboro, but entertaining play from both #NERevs and #Whitecaps.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Tough defense on both sides, #NEvVAN ends scoreless ---> http://t.co/yyPbKL431q #NERevs #VWFC http://t.co/yYyOeq0kp1

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Tough defense on both sides, #NEvVAN ends scoreless ---> http://t.co/yyPbKL431q #NERevs #VWFC http://t.co/yYyOeq0kp1

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution kickoff their home campaign against the Vancouver Whitecaps.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs Vancouver Whitecaps | March 22, 2014

timelineItems.name: Gillette Stadium
timelineItems.text: Cool shot from @dsicsphoto taken before today's @nerevolution match. #regram #nerevs http://t.co/GpEs8v6kqO

timelineItems.name: Gillette Stadium
timelineItems.text: Cool shot from @dspics taken before today's @nerevolution match. #regram #nerevs http://t.co/a5Fse3q1X7

timelineItems.name: Derek DeCoste
timelineItems.text: @Farpostpodcast #nerevs playing creative offense. It's also nice to have Goncalves back.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 20' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 It's Sene's turn to have a go and his shot from 20 yards is on target, but Ousted gets low to his left to save.

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Good opening 20 mins by #nerevs but have to turn this dominance into a goal

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 21': #VWFC beginning to settle into the match. More possession and better movement from the boys in white

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: Lee and Rowe in the midfield, Saer Sene on the wing...yes, this is the #NERevs offense we've been waiting for in 2014...

timelineItems.name: Residualimage
timelineItems.text: Not a lot of successful link play from the 'Caps yet. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Gerald Kimber White
timelineItems.text: Gorgeous weather for the @NERevolution home opener! Let's go, #NERevs! http://t.co/xfU6my0duC

timelineItems.name: Gerald Kimber White
timelineItems.text: Gorgeous weather for the @NERevolution home opener! Let's go, #NERevs! http://t.co/xfU6my0duC

timelineItems.name: Alex W
timelineItems.text: Two things immediately apparent: We missed JoGo and Sene #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Ousted strong through 20 mins but wind + long balls = blech. No evidence yet of building through midfield.

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: Could do without the useless lofted cross-field balls from Dorman, but #NERevs look good here.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps).
A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 25 minutes gone and still 0-0 between #NERevs and #VWFC at Gillette Stadium. Tune in live on CTV BC or listen on TEAM 1410, teamradio.ca

timelineItems.name: Mark S
timelineItems.text: Guess #WhitecapsFC don't show up for those early east coast games

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Walter Siu
timelineItems.text: Seriously, what happened to all the buildup play we saw in the first week? No support whatsoever. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Farrell really throws his weight around #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: Beautiful at the office #NERevs http://t.co/cM3yGnl9j5

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: Beautiful at the office #NERevs http://t.co/cM3yGnl9j5

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Chris Tierney (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Kenny Miller.

timelineItems.name: Geoff Flamank
timelineItems.text: 2 touches, 2 long direct balls. I don't like that. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 3' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Bunbury chopped down just outside the box. Great shooting position from 20 yards ... but it's into the wall.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Pace of this game has settled way down. Both teams waiting for the big chance. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Jonathan McGrain
timelineItems.text: Well done to Mike Burns and #NERevs for cleaning up the Jose Goncalves mess quickly and relatively quietly.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 30 minutes in, #NERevs with 57.1% of the possession. #NERevs #VWFC #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Max Ó'Maonaigh
timelineItems.text: Is it just me or are the #NERevs completely ignoring the left side if the field? Every attack ends up floating frown the right

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Much much better possession from #VWFC here

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right misses to the left. Assisted by Sebastian Fernandez.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Diego Fagundez shoots from the edge of the box but is denied by Ousted

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Oof. Tierney looked to be holding Mattocks back there...#NEvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: Vancouver starting to see more of the ball in the midfield. #NERevs need to start pressuring those CMs again and force the long ball.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Teal Bunbury.
Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 32' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Mattocks gets off the Whitecaps first shot of the day, but it's from a very tight angle and it's out for a throw-in.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andy Dorman (New England Revolution).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 33' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Back at the other end Fagundez wriggles free for a shot from the top of the box, but it's low and straight at Ousted.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Kelyn Rowe.

timelineItems.name: Renny Swan
timelineItems.text: That Mattocks whateverthatwas aside, best team defense from #NERevs so far this season. Also, not saying much, I know.

timelineItems.name: Mathew Harley
timelineItems.text: we have arguably the best midfield we've had in MLS era - and yet all they do is try the long ball from defender to strikers #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 36': Nothing comes from the #VWFC corner. Wind starting to pick-up, throwing off crosses a bit

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Chris Tierney.
Attempt blocked. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Saer Sene.

timelineItems.desc: Andy Dorman (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Andy Dorman is booked

timelineItems.name: Gary DeAsi
timelineItems.text: Decent seats. #nerevs @rickdecosta

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andy Dorman (New England Revolution).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Robert Grabe
timelineItems.text: Heaps is going to hurt himself down there. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Sene really doesn't like using his head. Big missed chance there #NERevs #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Diego would like to have that one back #NERevs

timelineItems.name: stephesker
timelineItems.text: #NEREVS #Homeopener #soccerlife

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #VWFC appear to have switched to a 4-4-2 diamond formation. Miller has moved further forward, Fernandez playing at the top of the diamond

timelineItems.name: Geno Anderson
timelineItems.text: New England! #NERevs @nerevolution @nerebellion

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved by David Ousted. Andy Dorman (New England Revolution) header from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: David Ousted shows cat like reflexes to deny Andy Dorman

timelineItems.comment: Saer Sene (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Kevin Koczwara
timelineItems.text: Really windy here at Gillette. Interesting to see how goalkeeper deal with it. #NERevs #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Andy O'Brien.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 3': #VWFC block the free kick out for a corner

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Few in the league can sell a shirt tug like Kenny Miller.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).
Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Stychyshyn
timelineItems.text: If #VWFC can survive this 45' they will get a lot chances with this wind, hopefully.

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Ward
timelineItems.text: The Fort sounds great today. Shame I can't be there #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Midnight Riders
timelineItems.text: Turned out to be a beautiful day to be in The Fort #nerevs http://t.co/Ci0nmFoSqc

timelineItems.name: Midnight Riders
timelineItems.text: Turned out to be a beautiful day to be in The Fort #nerevs http://t.co/Ci0nmFoSqc

timelineItems.comment: Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Caps passing at 67 per cent right now. Seems high! Nothing doing for Laba and Reo-Coker.

timelineItems.name: Paul Albi
timelineItems.text: Teibert's hair, wow. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Slow first half, but fear not #VWFC fans. Plenty of difference makers ready and waiting on the bench for the second half

timelineItems.comment: Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Sene's got to get a good touch on that #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jake Nemec
timelineItems.text: Way too many lazy turnovers in the midfield. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: @Buz_Meg We'll see Koffie in the this game.. 60-65 I'd say.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We're into three minutes of first-half stoppage time. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth is tested for the first time of the game by Miller

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: Sene still doesn't look ready. Very slow and labored running. Wouldn't mind seeing Imbongo up top the 2nd half with Bunbury at RW. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Shuttleworth with 50% passing accuracy in 1st half. Has to do better than that #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Darren Mattocks.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Aside from the near foul on Mattocks, Tierney has been good this match #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Lazy defending in the midfield there #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 45'+2 #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Miller gets a shot away from 18 yards, but his curling effort is handled easily by Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: Derek DeCoste
timelineItems.text: #NERevs best half all season. They deserve better than a 0-0 score at half. @Farpostpodcast @AlexiLalas @jeff_lemieux

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: #NERevs 0-0 #VWFC. 'Caps took a while to get settled, but some positive signs at the end of the half

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New England Revolution 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: If I had Darren Mattocks up front, I'd play a lot of balls over the top too. But they do have to clear the defense...#NEvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Mathieu Thibault
timelineItems.text: Where is Morales ? #VWFC

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: #nerevs dominated 1st 30 mins but couldn’t score. #VWFC came into it as 1st half progressed. Game could go either way 0-0 at half

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 0-0 at halftime between #NERevs and #VWFC. Some better play from the boys in the last 5mins. Plenty of difference makers on the bench!

timelineItems.name: Michael West
timelineItems.text: Welp, love the defense, love the chances created, now just put a goal or two in. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: The scoreless streak continues. 225 minutes and 0 goals for #NERevs in 2014. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: HT #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Home side well on top through 45 mins (8-2 advantage in shots), but still searching for their first goal of 2014.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Ousted to #NERevs: You may be at home, but good luck getting past me! Oh what a save --> http://t.co/01AVhMm89O #NEvVAN knotted at half 0-0

timelineItems.name: Charles DiRienzo
timelineItems.text: I'm at Gillette Stadium! (Even though I'm a #nyrb fan) #mls #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #VWFC with 55% of possession in the first half

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New England Revolution 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Andy O'Brien tries a through ball, but Kenny Miller is caught offside.
Delay in match  (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Jason Boyne
timelineItems.text: How to distract a keeper #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Matthew Dubois
timelineItems.text: Good to be back #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Walter Siu
timelineItems.text: Morales for Seba is a good move, as long as the next move is NRC for Manneh, and soon. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 46' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Second half is underway. Pedro Morales into the game for Vancouver, replacing Sebastian Fernandez.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Johnny Leveron tries a through ball, but Kenny Miller is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: The Fort bombards David Ousted's goal with streamers...Paul Mariner approves. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Amy
timelineItems.text: My afternoon! #soccer #NERevs home opener

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Jordan Harvey.
Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: cathalconlon
timelineItems.text: The Forts ready. The players are ready. It's go time! #nerevs #bethere322

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Andy Dorman (New England Revolution) header from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by David Ousted.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're underway from Gillette Stadium! #NEvVAN, join us: http://t.co/v0ZzUhpnKU

timelineItems.name: Walter Siu
timelineItems.text: What a save by Ousted. Wow. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Vancity Footy Fan
timelineItems.text: WHAT A SAVE! OUSTED! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Lizbeth DeSelm
timelineItems.text: nothing like New England hospitality! #NERevs http://t.co/j551zvzs78

timelineItems.name: Lizbeth DeSelm
timelineItems.text: nothing like New England hospitality! #NERevs http://t.co/j551zvzs78

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: So many streamers #NERevs http://t.co/JG0Bfe6Mp3

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: So many streamers #NERevs http://t.co/JG0Bfe6Mp3

timelineItems.name: Martin MacMahon
timelineItems.text: Morales in for Fernandez. Will be interesting to see if Miller pushes out wide or if Morales a straight swap.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Make sure to follow our Match Centre page for a statistical look at how the game's going: http://t.co/6PBXtEo1xw #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #VWFC dominating possession to start the second half. Things are looking on the up and up for the boys in white

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pedro Morales.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: I like bringing Morales on, but the double pivot of Laba and Reo-Coker seems a bit pedestrian for me. Neither looks to advance much. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Rain coming down at Gillette now. Doesn't look like enough to impact the #NEvVAN game coming up shortly #NERevs #VWFC #MLS #HomeOpener

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Kenny Miller to wear the armband today. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Froyo Gurl��
timelineItems.text: Revs game starting in 18 min. !! #nerevs @nerevolution #excited #firsthomegameoftheseason #goodluck

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: Vancouver has done well to take over the midfield. Pressuring higher than us and limiting our time on the ball. Not good. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Amanda Perra
timelineItems.text: Found my happy place #NERevs #BeThere322 #gameday @NERevolution http://t.co/KgtUIfwkd8

timelineItems.name: Amanda Perra
timelineItems.text: Found my happy place #NERevs #BeThere322 #gameday @NERevolution http://t.co/KgtUIfwkd8

timelineItems.text: 51' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Danger for the Revs as Shuttleworth is nearly caught off his line, but he recovers to tip away Miller's looping shot.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Kelyn Rowe.

timelineItems.name: Rev Girls
timelineItems.text: Let's do this #NERevs! #RevsGame http://t.co/zaeydvEm63

timelineItems.name: Rev Girls
timelineItems.text: Let's do this #NERevs! #RevsGame http://t.co/zaeydvEm63

timelineItems.name: casmcgr
timelineItems.text: Revs home opener :) #revolution #NErevs

timelineItems.name: Conor Frederick
timelineItems.text: View from the Fort . #nerevs

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 9 - There have been 9 first half goals scored in the last 2 @MLS meetings between @NERevolution and @WhitecapsFC. Watch. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: #NERevs game starting now on @CSNNE Vancouver is unbeaten 2 games in, while Revs haven't scored a goal yet & sit at 0-2 #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: #NERevs GM Mike Burns meeting with media, says it's all honky dory now with Jose Goncalves. He's back in Starting XI today, will be captain.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #VWFC Starting XI: Ousted, Beitashour, O'Brien, Leveron, Harvey, Reo-Coker, Laba, Teibert, Miller, Fernández, Mattocks #MLS

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Burns talked to media pregame. Decision on Joseph will be made in the coming week #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Adrian™
timelineItems.text: No Morales in the starting XI for #VWFC. Maybe Robbo thinks he needs more training time with the team before a permanent starting spot?

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Looks like Goncalves situation is worked out according to Burns. Will be captain today. #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: Brian Little
timelineItems.text: Shuttleworth is gonna have to put in the game of his life today. I got a feeling if not Pickens is starting next week. #NERevs #DemRevs

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - The team that scores first between @NERevolution and @WhitecapsFC has won just 1 game of 4 @MLS meetings (1D 2L). Unusual. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Nick Ironside
timelineItems.text: Spoke too soon about New England weather. It is now drizzling at Gillette, just in time for kickoff. #NERevs http://t.co/e69RimbFc8

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Robbo on Teibert's return (from TEAM 1410): "It brings an energy, an enthusiasm, a work ethic I think we missed last week." #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: gillettestadium
timelineItems.text: Game day! #nerevs #bethere322

timelineItems.name: Ron Bower
timelineItems.text: #NERevs Season 6. Here we go! #BeThere322

timelineItems.name: Nick Ironside
timelineItems.text: Spoke too soon about New England weather. It is now drizzling at Gillette, just in time for kickoff. #NERevs http://t.co/e69RimbFc8

timelineItems.name: r_j_d8
timelineItems.text: Good to be back at field level. #nerevs #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Geno Anderson
timelineItems.text:
#NewEnglandRevolution Home Opener. In #TheFort with @pino_coolada and Mohawk Kid. 
#BeThere322  #ImHere322 #NERevs #TheRebellion

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #NERevs playing a 4-1-4-1 formation. Will be interesting to see the tactical battle against #VWFC's 4-2-3-1 today

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Gonna be another windy opener at Gillette today. #VWFC #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We'll finally see the #NERevs full new primary kits in action for the first time today. Blue jerseys, white shorts, blue striped socks.

timelineItems.name: Hadlee Coker
timelineItems.text: Let's go boys!!!! #NERevs http://t.co/0a5rIHGne2

timelineItems.name: Hadlee Coker
timelineItems.text: Let's go boys!!!! #NERevs http://t.co/0a5rIHGne2

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: I do love this kit though. Jersey is a little boring, but comes together nicely with white shorts and the socks. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 1' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 We're underway and soccer is back in Foxborough!

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps).
José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: 2nd half! Let's go! #NERevs http://t.co/ld8HTJI3KD

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: 2nd half! Let's go! #NERevs http://t.co/ld8HTJI3KD

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: Morales picking things up for the #WhitecapsFC. Doing well to create some offensive opportunities

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: The Fort is rocking! #NERevs http://t.co/SKugAjmHaa

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: The Fort is rocking! #NERevs http://t.co/SKugAjmHaa

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Three positive attacking moves from Morales on about as many touches. First real look on wing for Mattocks in his time with Caps.

timelineItems.comment: Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Chris Tierney (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Pedro Morales free kick goes dangerously past the post

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 53' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Rowe bombs down the right wing and whips in a deep cross, which Fagundez heads back across. But it's cleared.

timelineItems.name: Steve Hemphill
timelineItems.text: #vwfc need to get Manneh on the pitch.

timelineItems.name: Sam Killen
timelineItems.text: :) I love soccer season #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.
Attempt blocked. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 56' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Morales stings a free kick from 25 yards which beats the wall, but it's wide of the post.

timelineItems.name: Martin MacMahon
timelineItems.text: Looks like it's Mattocks dropping wide to accommodate introduction of Morales. Will be interesting to watch.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Kelyn Rowe's shot curls inches wide of the post

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 58': We recognize that face. Former #VWFC player Daigo Kobayashi subs on for Saer Sene. We like Daigo, but today he is the nemesis

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Sene looked a little off today, Heaps makes the switch at the right time. #NERevs #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
Delay in match José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Jason Kurylo
timelineItems.text: What a spectacular stop by Ousted - might be the best save he’s made since joining #Whitecapsfc.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 5' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 SAVE! What a stop from Ousted. Dorman's near-post flick from Tierney's corner was palmed away expertly.

timelineItems.name: Lee Harvey Oswaldo
timelineItems.text: It's all #NERevs, looking physical compared to #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 59' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Kobayashi involved immediately as he helps set up Rowe, whose shot flies wide of the left post.

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Encouraging hour from Saer Sene. When fit, great option for the misfiring #NERevs. #NEvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: Does mattocks think he's Manneh!? #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: 13,103 in the stands per #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 61' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Fantastic stuff from Farrell. Stands up Mattocks in a 1v1 situation, then bursts forward to start the attack.

timelineItems.name: Miles Halpine
timelineItems.text: Damn. @2Fast2Farrell doing work, as always. #NERevs #NEvVAN http://t.co/VVILCEPT1X

timelineItems.name: Miles Halpine
timelineItems.text: Damn. @2Fast2Farrell doing work, as always. #NERevs #NEvVAN http://t.co/VVILCEPT1X

Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Residualimage
timelineItems.text: Midfield looking a little less crowded right now, should be adv Whitecaps #VWFC

timelineItems.text: Attendance for #NERevs home opener: 13,103. #MLS http://t.co/P2hTfOP9yC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Johnny Leveron.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Thinking we see Imbongo soon. Maybe Bengtson? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: So, I guess I can start writing my "Manneh sparks Caps' road win in windy New England" story?

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Nigel Reo-Coker tries a through ball, but Kenny Miller is caught offside.
Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).
Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: The Revs keep attaking with Diego Fagundez just missing the mark

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Teal Bunbury.

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Attendance is biggest at #NERevs home opener since 2007and 3rd best since 2002

timelineItems.name: Dana D
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC finally Manneh's on

timelineItems.name: Tait Rourke
timelineItems.text: Good to be back!!! Lets go #nerevs

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: New England Til I Die! #NERevs http://t.co/FA6d8VGGTa

timelineItems.text: New England Til I Die! #NERevs http://t.co/FA6d8VGGTa

timelineItems.name: Vancity Footy Fan
timelineItems.text: Teibert's played well, but Manneh's offensive upside is better. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Jason Boyne
timelineItems.text: Awesome seats for Revs season opener! #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 7': #NERevs still haven't scored this season, but they're obviously antsy to get on the board. #VWFC will need to be on their toes

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: 20 mins to go and wondering where the #NERevs goal will come from. #VWFC look capable of stealing one here on counter attack

timelineItems.name: Vancity Footy Fan
timelineItems.text: Yay! I got my wish! Koffie! #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Andy O'Brien (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Pedro Morales with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Residualimage
timelineItems.text: WOOOHOOO Koffie is on #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by José Gonçalves.
Attempt blocked. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Daigo Kobayashi.

timelineItems.name: Sean Donahue
timelineItems.text: Saer Sene completed 91% of his passes in his 58 minutes on the field. Best passing accuracy on the #NERevs so far tonight.

timelineItems.name: Alex W
timelineItems.text: Rowe looking very good on more than one occasion #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Rowe with an incredible bit of skill in the midfield. FInal thrid is really lacking for the #NERevs though. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Teal Bunbury.
Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Samuel Santos
timelineItems.text: I can't believe Miller plays another full 90 mins today, he's invisible. Should've been Miller for Morales at half, fernandez stays #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Abram in 4-bits
timelineItems.text: Honestly, and I never thought if be the one to tweet this, but Bengtson>Teal. #NERevs #DammitTeal

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: Not impressed with Bunbury thus far #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Jordan Harvey.
Attempt missed. Andy Dorman (New England Revolution) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by José Gonçalves with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Rowe is honestly improving consistently with each season that passes. Best player on the field right now #MLS #NERevs #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: The Midnight Ride
timelineItems.text: Looking at the bench for #nerevs and again I have to ask questions about team selection. No width or speed available to sub on.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrew Farrell.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Andy O'Brien.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Ousted. Seriously, wow. #NERevs #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Was saying this privately a couple days ago, but IMO very smart by #NERevs to reconcile with Goncalves. Too talented to feud with him #MLS

timelineItems.name: VanCityVilla
timelineItems.text: 8 minutes in and Reo-Coker already looks gassed #Whitecapsfc

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: I'd strongly prefer that Bunbury turn in that type of counter attack situation #NERevs

timelineItems.name: J.Spence
timelineItems.text: Every time the #NERevs look to go on a run, someone inevitably makes a pass & slows down the attack and the opportunity fizzles.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kenny Miller.

timelineItems.name: Ben Saufley
timelineItems.text: What the hell happened to this team’s offense? Given these chances they score 9/10 last year. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Walter Siu
timelineItems.text: Morales v Daigo. Daigo’s winning. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: Easily the best Andy Dorman performance since his #NERevs return last year.

timelineItems.desc: Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Jordan Harvey is booked for pulling down Bunbury

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Gershon Koffie.

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: Imbongo for Nguyen. Moving to a 4-4-2 with Rowe in CAM I'm guessing #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution).
Foul by Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Scott Brewer
timelineItems.text: Kelyn Rowe is about the only bright spot in #NEvVAN game. vancouver look lost and both teams are barely moving off the ball. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: The Midnight Ride
timelineItems.text: I expected Imbongo - Don't know about that sub - Dorman appears gassed and Nguyen has been involved. #Nerevs

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Jay Heaps is "pacing like a mountain cat now" #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt missed. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Chris Tierney.

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: Ousted is by far the man of the match, Only one doing much of anything. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.desc: Matias Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Time wasting costs Matias Laba

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Gershon Koffie.
Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Ben Saufley
timelineItems.text: A million attempts. How many on goal? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 88': Yellow card to Laba

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: Smart dive Kobayashi. I hate to say it. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Saer Sene (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 9' #NERevs 0 #VWFC 0 Another free-kick opportunity for the Revs after Rowe is clipped, but Sene's effort is high and wide.

timelineItems.comment: Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: Rowe is holding his hamstring. Doesn't look good #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Michael Leach
timelineItems.text: David Ousted is very vocal with his defenders. Reminds me of another Danish keeper, Peter Schmeichel. #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Alex Schieferdecker
timelineItems.text: Pedro Morales has been very very poor for #VWFC today. #NEvVAN

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: Nervous about the Kellen Rowe injury. Headed straight down the tunnel. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by A.J. Soares.

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Kelyn Rowe has been dealing with hamstring problems past couple weeks. Surprised Heaps gave him that much run today #NERevs #NEvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jason Kurylo
timelineItems.text: I don’t want a team that’s happy with a single point. Where’s the killer instinct, #whitecapsfc? #NERevs haven’t been threatened at all.

timelineItems.name: Sean Donahue
timelineItems.text: Dorman with 80% passing accuracy tonight. Significant improvement from 68% last weekend. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: So many blocked shots for Vancouver . Last chance for the #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrew Farrell.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Andy O'Brien.

timelineItems.name: Adrian™
timelineItems.text: Road point achieved. Now burn the tape. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New England Revolution 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.
